ygData.subject: Re: weapons in general
ygData.msgSnippet: you can auction derv rings to newbies that can t get em yet for 3 gold, maybe 4 ... From: Rich Mulawa  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
you can auction derv rings to newbies that can't get em yet for 3 gold,
maybe 4
-----Original Message-----
From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 21, 1999 10:42 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] weapons in general


>From: Rich Mulawa <richard.mulawa@...>
>
>>
>> i hope you guys understand that just about all of the high level
>wizards don't even HAVE weapons. i would much rather have 2 shimmering
>orbs than a staff i barely hit with, but that's at high level, now i'm
>very much content with my newly bought Runed Totem staff.
>>
>
>Yes this is true at high level. Until then you must melee. So my
>question stands what weapon is best?
>
>> oh and about the making money issue: sometimes your lucky. I was at
>the dervish camp in Northern Ro on Fennin Ro and for some reason for
>about 6 turns every derv that was on my turn had a BRONZE weapon! i
>got 3 bronze rapiers! (3pp per rapier) i made 30pp in two hours !
>
>I am truely happy for you. However, I went to NRO (with my bard I
>will take Guile soon) and was squished twice fortunately exp loss is
>inversely proportional to the creature level that kills you so other
>than leaving an ugly mark there was no big problem with it. On the
>issue of luck, I have received 2 bronze weapons in all my time in NRO
>and 1 or 2 gems. How much time have I spent there you ask? I have 5
>thats FIVE backpacks in the bank filled with derv rings that I cannot
>pay people to take FROM me! So please don't tell me about LUCKY ways
>to make money. I need real advice on tried and true ways to earn
>money to equip my character.
>
>
>
